pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Tummy Butter for Stretch Marks 125g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Tummy Butter for Stretch Marks is an intensive treatment which helps visibly improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of stretch marks.

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Tummy Butter for Stretch Marks is a thick cocoa butter that melts on contact with your skin. Formulated with a natural blend of Cocoa Butter, Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Collagen and Elastin to nourish and help improve skin's suppleness. This gentle balm is the ideal consistency to rub all over belly, breasts, hips and thighs during and after pregnancy, or weight loss to reduce the appearance of stretch marks. Dermatologist tested and safe for use during pregnancy.

Suitable For: Sensitive skin

Product Claims: Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks

Recommended By: Dermatologist

Size: 125g

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Dermatologist Recommended?: Yes

Dermatologically Approved?: Yes

Hypo Allergenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Sensitive

KEY FEATURES

• Intensive treatment clinically proven to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks
• 48 hour moisture
• Dermatologist approved
• Ideal for nighttime use
• Free of mineral oil, parabens and phthalates
• Vegan

Warnings

Skin sensitivity heightens during pregnancy. We advise testing this and all skin care products on a small area, such as the inner forearm, 48 hours before first use. Do not use if signs of irritation or rash appear. After using the product, if irritation or rash appears, discontinue use. If irritation or rash persists, consult your doctor.

Ingredients

Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Elastin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Xanthophylls, Fragrance (Parfum).

Contains: Collagen, Argan Oil, Elastin, Shea Butter

Directions

Using a circular motion, gently massage into stretch mark prone areas 3 times a day or as often as possible. FOR BEST RESULTS: First apply Palmer's Massage Lotion for Stretch Marks all over body.
